name: ORD_LAB_CC
description: This table includes additional CC LIst information for submitters and free text names from Orders (ORD) items 51105-51109 and 51111-51120. The Free Text Address (I ORD 51110) item is included in the ORD_LAB_ADDRESS_CC table.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CC_COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description: The country category number for the address to send CCs to.
